Name: Light Up the Holidays
About the game: Design the light show of your dreams! In Light Up the Holidays you decorate a variety of houses and other buildings in lights of any size and colour. You can create stunning scenes in minutes and musical light shows with a few clicks! Features: Edit each individual light's size, length, and color Save your lights into patterns that you can quickly copy and paste Sync each light to a frequency, either bass, mid, or high, and watch as they automatically time to the beat Import your own music from your hard drive to use in your light shows Control every aspect of your scene; time of day, time progression speed, weather, and world rotation Decorate your scenes with environmental objects that can be moved, rotated, and scaled Bring your scenes to life by painting any object with color Convert your scene into a live desktop wallpaper using Wallpaper Engine *Coming Soon* Sandbox mode; build your own houses to decorate Light Up the Holidays provides the ultimate Christmas light simulation for when you're stuck inside on a snowy day this winter. Whether you want to relive your childhood or plan out your next home light display, there's something for everyone here.
